news

An general news entry
{
  "config": Object (config),
  "tags": Array (String),
  "receiver": Array (Object (author)),
  "resources": Array (Mixed),
  "profileImage": Base64,
  "read": Boolean,
  "source": Mixed,
  "author": Object (author),
  "meta": Object (meta),
  "sendDate": Date,
  "readDate": DateTime,
  "expires": Duration,
  "price": Number,
  "rating": Integer,
  "content": String,
  "question": String,
  "version": String,
  "coffeeTime": Time,
  "profileUri": URI,
}
FieldDescription
configObject (config)
tagsArray (String)
MinItems
1
MaxItems
6
receiverArray (Object (author))
MinItems
1
resourcesArray (Mixed)
profileImageBase64
readBoolean
sourceMixed
OneOf
  • Object (author)
  • Object (web)

An simple author element with some description

Some meta data

readDateDateTime
expiresDuration

1
Maximum

1

author

An simple author element with some description
{
  "title": String,
  "email": String / Null,
  "categories": Array (String),
  "locations": Array (Object (location)),
  "origin": Object (location),
}
FieldDescription
titleString
Pattern
[A-z]{3,16}
emailString / Null
We will send no spam to this address
categoriesArray (String)
MaxItems
8
locationsArray (Object (location))
Array of locations
originObject (location)
Location of the person

  "url": String,

}

meta

Some meta data
{
  "createDate": DateTime,
  "^tags_\d$": String,
  "^location_\d$": Object (location),
}
FieldDescription
createDateDateTime
^tags_\d$String
^location_\d$Object (location)

location

{

  "long": Number,
